mapper.update: update order set o_petId = #{o_petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_quantity = #{o_quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_shipDate = #{o_shipDate,jdbcType=DATE}, o_status = #{o_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_complete = #{o_complete,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where o_id = #{o_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select o_id, o_petId, o_quantity, o_shipDate, o_status, o_complete from order
